Module io.inverno.mod.http.client
Package io.inverno.mod.http.client

Interface HttpClient.Request<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends Exchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>>

Type Parameters:
A - the exchange context type
B - the exchange type
C - the interceptable exchange type
All Superinterfaces:
BaseRequest
All Known Subinterfaces:
Endpoint.Request<A,B,C>
Enclosing interface:
HttpClient
public static interface HttpClient.Request<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends Exchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>> extends BaseRequest

An HTTP client request.

Since:
1.6
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

  • Method Details

    • intercept

      HttpClient.Request<A,B,C> intercept(ExchangeInterceptor<A,C> interceptor) throws IllegalStateException

      Specifies an interceptor to intercept the request before it is sent to the endpoint.

      When invoked multiple time this method chains the interceptors one after the other.

      Parameters:
      interceptor - an exchange interceptor
      Returns:
      the request
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the request has already been sent

    • headers

      HttpClient.Request<A,B,C> headers(Consumer<OutboundRequestHeaders> headersConfigurer) throws IllegalStateException

      Specifies HTTP headers to be sent in the request.

      Parameters:
      headersConfigurer - an HTTP headers configurer
      Returns:
      the request
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the request has already been sent

    • authority

      HttpClient.Request<A,B,C> authority(String authority) throws IllegalStateException

      Specifies the request authority.

      This corresponds to the authority form as defined by RFC1230 Section 5.3.3 specified in the host header or :authority psuedo-header.

      Parameters:
      authority - the request authority
      Returns:
      the request
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the request has already been sent

    • body

      HttpClient.Request<A,B,C> body(Consumer<RequestBodyConfigurator> bodyConfigurer) throws IllegalStateException

      Specifies the request body.

      Parameters:
      bodyConfigurer - a body configurer
      Returns:
      the request
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the request has already been sent
